help-file.title: SPIRITUALIST
help-file.content:
The Spiritualist has mastered the art of both life and death. He is able to heal more effectively than his other Shaman counterparts. Having seen beyond death, the Spiritualist cannot be shaken by mortal intimidation. It is even said that at the highest form of their art, they can even stave off death itself!
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 36th level: Improved Heal 56th level: Resurrection
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 7th circle: Indomitability 10th circle: Spirit Walk
